```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# libraries 
library(tidyverse)
install.packages("ggjoy")
library(ggplot2)
library(ggjoy)
```


```{r}
# Download the Data
url="https://www.ons.gov.uk/visualisations/dvc661/drugs/datadownload.csv"
suicide_stats <- readr::read_csv(url)
```

```{r}
suicide_stats %>%
ggplot(aes(Age,2017))+
  geom_joy() + 
  theme_joy() 
```
